mapper.insert: insert into t_order_detail ( orderid, dorderno, confirmdate, sku, sizeid, dealmodeid, dealmgrid, dealdate, thflag, joindate, qty, customerrequest, dorderstatus, fhdate, expressno, expressway, transferCorp, sendsysno, sendJapan, pid, deleflag, delReason, delDatetime, delMgrid, propertyid, mgrid, whw, reportissent, isreceive, tt_mgrid, exp_num, exp_datetime, flag, flaga, PurchaseNo, SExpressNo, isComplete, completeDate, arrive_expressno, arrive_date, arrive_mgrid ) VALUES( #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str_to_date(#{confirmDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sizeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealModeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealMgrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, str_to_date(#{dealDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{thFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, str_to_date(#{joinDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H'), #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dOrderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, str_to_date(#{fhDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{expressNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferCorp,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sendSysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendJapan,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{delReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str_to_date(#{delDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H'), #{delMgrid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propertyId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{mgrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{whw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportIsSent,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isReceive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ttMgrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, str_to_date(#{expDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H'), #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{flaga,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{purchaseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sExpressNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isComplete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, str_to_date(#{completeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H'), #{arriveExpressno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str_to_date(#{arriveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{arriveMgrId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
